file_content.text: This is Gosse, head of the local Selonian sept. She can get us inside Coronet Shipping.
Whatever's threatening the Selonians, we can help.
Let's all stay calm....
Has something happened to the Selonians?
What do you mean?
You were ready and willing to help us before.
But we had a deal!
The price of letting the Empire win is much higher.
We all take risks.
Even if you swore loyalty to the Empire now, they wouldn't spare your sept.
The Empire is ruthless.
This isn't just about your sept. The Empire is a threat to the entire galaxy.
We're in this together.
You really think the Empire wouldn't have done that anyway?
That's not our fault.
If I get them out, is there somewhere safe they can go?
I want to help them.
She means we have to work together. You help us reach the neutron emitters, we help your sept evacuate.
He's saying we're in this together. You get us inside the tunnels, we help your sept escape the Empire.
I'll clear out the Imperials and help as many as I can.
I'll do my very best.
Can't really ask for more than that.
Will you two be alright from here?
What about you?
I expect a guided tour of the Selonian tunnels after this.
Better be worth it.
Place looks pretty cleared out. Gosse and I will get back to the Red Light Sector and meet up with General Aves.
The Imperials will hit the Selonians hard once they discover our escape. You better move fast.
Cole Cantarus? General Aves sent me to get you out of here.
Just in time too--I didn't like the looks of those Imperial interrogators.
Not anymore. My people are in danger. I am glad to be free, but this has gone too far.
Selonians are in danger because we helped Republic. You helping us back would bring more.
That was a mistake. I risked my life to help Republic. But I am alive, and my sept is dying.
Empire smelled Selonian betrayal. Now they know we helped CorSec and the Republic. They attacked our homes.
My sept is trapped. They leave their burrows, the Imperials kill them. They stay, they starve to death.
Empire should punish the leader, not the sept.
Maybe not. But I made them angry. They take revenge on my sept.
I lead my sept. Their lives are in my hands.
Too late to guess now.
The Red Light Sector is safe. They know the way. Selonians move fast if the way is clear.
This is war, fuzzball.
If you think you can save them, go fast. Our burrows are in the shipyards, hidden in the wreckage.
Imperials have my sept surrounded. They will try to stop you. Keep the Selonians out of the fight.
Save my sept from the Empire, and then we talk deals.
